function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate tools for contact tracing and social distancing","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and burden on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and testing of the tools, combined with public health messaging on their limitations","Technologies":"Advanced sensor technology, machine learning algorithms, and data analytics","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and governments","Owner":"Health organizations, technology companies, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Negative impact on mental health due to the pandemic","Impact":"Rise in stress, depression, anxiety, and insomnia cases, affecting overall well-being","Mitigation":"Access to mental health support services, promotion of stress management techniques, and community-based initiatives","Technologies":"Wearable stress detection systems, telehealth platforms, and mental health apps","People":"Individuals affected by the pandemic","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, mental health professionals, and community support groups"}]}
